alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Inland Northern Brevard; Inland Southern Brevard; Inland Volusia; Mainland Northern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Northern Brevard Barrier Islands; Orange; Seminole; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 3:54PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms developing over the next hour will impact portions of eastern Seminole, northern Brevard, southeastern Orange and southeastern Volusia Counties... At 353 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking developing thunderstorms and a pending collision of an outflow boundary and the east coast sea breeze. The storms and outflow are currently along a line extending from 8 miles southwest of New Smyrna Beach to 6 miles south of Maytown to 8 miles south of Wedgefield. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Orlando, Deltona, Titusville, Oviedo, and Winter Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
